= Subconvert 0.5.2 changelog

NOTE: Subconvert wasn't using Semantic Versioning at this point

== Changes since 0.5.0:

=== New features

* force option

* verbose option

=== Bug fixes

* writing a newly created file

* unescaped curly braces in microdvd and subrip that caused crashes
